blast-door.desc: Main blast door (heavy — Mechanical 20 to close on AT-ST, Strength to manual override)

blast-door-left.desc: Left side of blast door (partial cover from doorframe)

blast-door-right.desc: Right side of blast door (partial cover from doorframe)

side-entry.desc: Side personnel entrance (less guarded, leads to alley — locked from outside, Security 10)

ship-ramp.desc: Boarding ramp of the Rusty Mynock (Starship Repair 15 to fix before launch)

ship-cockpit.desc: Cockpit area (Astrogation 15 to plot hyperspace jump, comms panel inside)

ship-top-hatch.desc: Below top hatch (Climbing 10 to reach, alternate entry — bypasses ramp)

ship-bow.desc: Between mandibles (exposed, but good angle to fire at blast door entrance)

ship-stern.desc: Ship rear (engine section — Repair 15 to jury-rig engine boost for takeoff)

ship-port.desc: Port side (left — landing strut here, can duck under hull for cover)

ship-starboard.desc: Starboard side (right — landing strut here, cover from east side fire)

ship-turret.desc: Dorsal turret position (quad laser — Starship Gunnery 4D+2, but needs power: Repair 12)

cargo-left.desc: Left cargo cluster (can push crates to block doorways, Strength 15)

cargo-left-behind.desc: Behind left cargo (+2D cover, dead Rebel pilot's body — datapad with Bay 94 codes)

cargo-right.desc: Right cargo cluster (Imperial supply crates — 4 E-11 blasters, 2 medpacs)

cargo-right-behind.desc: Behind right cargo (+2D cover, good sniper position toward blast door)

cargo-left-top.desc: On top of left cargo (Climbing 10, +1D elevation bonus, exposed)

cargo-right-top.desc: On top of right cargo (Climbing 10, +1D elevation bonus, exposed)

fuel-barrels.desc: Fuel barrels (EXPLOSIVE — shoot to detonate 6D damage, 5m radius; or roll toward blast door)

fuel-barrels-behind.desc: Behind fuel barrels (cover, but VERY dangerous if barrels are hit)

maintenance-pit.desc: Maintenance pit (recessed — characters hidden from ground-level fire, repair tools inside)

maintenance-pit-tools.desc: Pit tool rack (hydrospanner, welding torch — 3D melee weapon, plasma cutter — can cut through doors)

control-panel.desc: Bay control panel (blast door override, lights kill switch, comms — Computer Prog 10)

catwalk-left.desc: Left catwalk (upper level, +1D high ground, ladder at west end)

catwalk-right.desc: Right catwalk (upper level, +1D high ground, ladder at east end)

catwalk-left-end.desc: Left catwalk west end (ladder down to bay floor)

catwalk-right-end.desc: Right catwalk east end (ladder down to bay floor)

at-st-approach.desc: AT-ST approach zone (clear line of fire to ship — danger zone during climax)

bay-floor-left.desc: Open bay floor, left side (no cover)

bay-floor-right.desc: Open bay floor, right side (no cover)

bay-floor-center.desc: Open bay floor center (between ship and door — kill zone during assault)

ladder-left.desc: Ladder to left catwalk (Climbing 5, takes 1 round)

ladder-right.desc: Ladder to right catwalk (Climbing 5, takes 1 round)

obstacles.desc: South wall left of blast door
South wall right of blast door

ship.desc: Rusty Mynock YT-1300 (needs Repair 15 to fly, turret needs Repair 12 for power)

cargo.desc: Cargo crate clusters (+2D cover — left has dead Rebel's datapad, right has Imperial weapons)

upper-level.desc: Catwalks and control panel (high ground +1D, ladders take 1 round to climb)

entrances.desc: Bay entry points (blast door closeable, side entry locked Security 10)

open-floor.desc: Open bay floor (no cover — kill zone during assault)

tactical.desc: Tactical positions (fuel barrels EXPLOSIVE 6D, maintenance pit has tools, catwalks give +1D)
